solution_line_template: After paying off the cost of ingredients, Andrew has ${total_earnings} - ${ingredient_cost} = $<<{total_earnings}-{ingredient_cost}={remaining_money_after_costs}>>{remaining_money_after_costs}

Since half of the money goes to the homeless shelter, the shelter receives ${remaining_money_after_costs} / {donation_divisor} = $<<{remaining_money_after_costs}/{donation_divisor}={shelter_donation_from_sale}>>{shelter_donation_from_sale}

After contributing some of his own money, Andrew donates ${shelter_donation_from_sale} + ${personal_donation} = $<<{shelter_donation_from_sale}+{personal_donation}={total_shelter_donation}>>{total_shelter_donation} to the shelter.
